pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dose-Response Modeling with Smoothing Splines // Provides tools for assessing the shape of a dose-response curve by testing linearity and non-linearity at user-defined cut-offs. It also provides two methods of estimating a threshold dose, or the dose at which the dose-response function transitions to significantly increasing: bi-linear (based on pkg 'segmented') and smoothed with splines (based on pkg 'mgcv').
